name: Travelpro Maxlite Air V2 Hardside Expandable Checked Luggage, 8 Spinner Wheels, Lightweight Hard Shell Suitcase, TSA lock, Black, Checked Large 28-Inch
short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT, DOMESTIC CHECK-IN AIRLINE COMPLIANT: Overall Dimensions (includes wheels and handles): H: 30.5 in. W: 19.5 in. D: 12 in.; Case Dimensions: H: 27.5 in. W: 18.5 in. D: 12 in.; Weight: 10.9 lbs.
EXPANDABLE AND ORGANIZED: Expands 2” for extra space when needed. Two zippered divider panels with pockets keep items secure and organized.
EFFORTLESS & SECURE MOBILITY: 8 Smooth-Gliding 360° Spinner Wheels and adjustable PowerScope Lite Handle provide easy and comfortable traveling. TSA approved lock provides security.

DURABLE AND ECO-FRIENDLY: Polycarbonate material flexes on impact to mitigate cracking. Reinforced internal corner guards resist denting. 100% Recycled Bottles ECOFAB Lining reduces environmental waste
LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY: Protection against defects in materials/workmanship. Trusted Companion Promise covers airline damage repair for One Year when purchased new and registered.
product_description: Pack more into your journey with the Maxlite® Air V2 Large Check-in Expandable Hardside Spinner. This sizable travel companion keeps things light and well secured, even on long trips or when you’re packing for the whole crew. Check it without worry. Despite its light-as-air build, the Large Maxlite® Air Check-in Spinner packs a punch when it comes to protection. The crack-resistant polycarbonate shell is beyond strong but flexible enough to absorb impact if dropped, and its stylish finish deflects visible wear. Upgraded inner corner guards are reinforced to resist damage in high-impact areas. An integrated TSA lock tells thieves to take a hike, and when you need more space, the expandable zipper adds plenty of room. Inside, smart organization and sustainability unite. ECOFAB™ lining, made from recycled plastic bottles (Approx. 19.5 bottles), is treated with H2O guard for added moisture resistance, while two zippered divider panels and multiple accessory pockets keep things in place. Maxlite® Air makes mobility a breeze on eight smooth-spinning wheels that rotate 360°. The PowerScope Lite handle adjusts to your height, and the rubberized Contour Grip adds comfort to control. Backed by our Built For a Lifetime Limited Warranty. Overall Dimensions (includes wheels and handles): H: 30.5 in. W: 19.5 in. D: 12 in.; Case Dimensions: H: 27.5 in. W: 18.5 in. D: 12 in.; Weight: 10.9 lbs.

product_description: Part of the Glimmering range, this large suitcase brings runway-inspired style to your travel routine with a blend of luxurious design and practical functionality. The elegant quilted front panel, accented by gold-tone hardware and detailing, gives the Glimmering Large a polished, high-fashion appeal, beautifully complemented by its chic interior. Thoughtful features include an easy-access front zippered pocket for essentials and a premium 8-wheel spinner system that delivers exceptional smoothness and control from check-in to arrival. With a spacious 106L packing capacity and an impressively lightweight construction, the Glimmering Large is perfectly suited for extended vacations or for travelers flying with airlines that enforce stricter weight limits.
